games.name: Retro Bowl
games.description: Experience the thrill of classic American football in Retro Bowl! Take control of your favorite team, manage your roster, and lead them to victory in this engaging sports simulation game.
games.instructions: Use arrow keys to move, spacebar to throw the ball. Manage your team between games and make strategic decisions to improve your roster.

games.name: Tiny Fishing
games.description: Dive into the relaxing world of Tiny Fishing! Cast your line, catch various fish species, upgrade your equipment, and become the master angler in this addictive fishing adventure.
games.instructions: Click and hold to cast your line, release to start fishing. Upgrade your equipment to catch bigger fish and earn more rewards.
